pages.text: This entry contains a sample of glass blocks from Quark that might better suit your desire for better windows.
If you like iron framed glass, here's the colorless variant from Quark's side of glass.
If you wanted invisible item frames, this item is for you! $(br2)Yes, it does have the same functionality of a regular Item Frame aside from being invisible.
